captions.text: Geon...
Geon
Geon!
No looking back, Geon
No looking back
Geon!
Goodbye My Love - Ailee
My tears remember
They fill up your space
It's impossible to erase you, no matter how I try
You've become my everything
Even if I can't see, even if I can't hear
It's okay with me
Even if break-ups are sad and hearts break
If you're happy
If you can smile, then I...
I'll miss you the more I try to get over you
I'll cry more than I have today
Like fate, that will never come back
My only one
I wish you all the best
My heart knows
This longing exploding in me
It's impossible to hide, no matter how I try
You're a part of my heart
Even if I can't have, even if I can't touch
It's okay with me
Even if it hurts a lot and tears fall
If you're happy
If you can smile, then I...
I'll miss you the more I try to get over you
I'll cry more than I have today
Like fate, that will never come back
My only one
I wish you all the best
You'll think of me once a while
I hope you look back on us from time to time
That's all I need, I wait for the day...
we meet again
I wait, goodbye my love

눈물은 기억하나 봐

내 전부가 된 그대

You 볼 수가 없어도 들을 수 없어도
그래도 난 괜찮아
이별이 슬퍼도 또 가슴이 시려도
그대만 행복하다면 웃을 수 있다면 난

지울수록 더 그리워지겠죠

단 하나 only you

Good bye my love

터질듯한 이 그리움

내 심장이 된 그대

You 가질 수 없어도 만질 수 없어도
그래도 난 괜찮아
한없이 아파도 또 눈물이 흘러도

단 하나 only you

한 번쯤은 나를 생각하겠죠
가끔씩은 우릴 추억하겠죠
그거면 돼 또 언젠가 만날
그날을 그대를
